instructions:
Prepare batter and bake as directed for cupcakes. Cool in pans 10 min. Pierce tops with fork.
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix until dissolved; spoon over cupcakes. Refrigerate 30 min. Remove from pans.
Spread whipped topping over cupcakes. Add decorations as desired. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 pkg. (4 serving size) JELL-O Brand Gelatin, any red flavor
1 (8 ounce) tub COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed
Suggested decorations: red and blue sprinkles, JET-PUFFED STARMALLOWS Marshmallows
title: Summer Poke Cupcakes
